amendment.description: An amendment numbered 35 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to allocate an additional $3 million for post-disaster watershed assessment studies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A033) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
